name: rule_documentation_presence_for_borrowers_1065_business
question: Is documentation present for borrowers 1065 business

steps.name: step_documentation_check
steps.expert_instructions:
1. From the application_date, extract application_year in the form {computed_application_year}.
   From the current_employer.start_date (or "1b Start Date"), extract start_year in the form {computed_application_year}.

2. Classify the Application Date into these categories:
   - early_year: 01/01/{computed_application_year} ≤ application_date < 04/14/{computed_application_year}
   - mid_year: 04/15/{computed_application_year} ≤ application_date < 10/14/{computed_application_year}
   - late_year: 10/15/{computed_application_year} ≤ application_date ≤ 12/31/{computed_application_year}
   - full_year: 01/01/{computed_application_year} ≤ application_date ≤ 12/31/{computed_application_year}

3. Check the difference between start date and application date and classify it into these:
   - long_tenured: current_employer.start_date ≤ application_date − 5 years
   - mid_tenured: (application_date − 5 years) < current_employer.start_date ≤ (application_date − 2 years)
   - recently_hired: current_employer.start_date ≥ (application_date − 2 years)

4. Decision Flow:

   IF (early_year AND long_tenured) THEN  
      Skip to Step 5  

   IF (mid_year AND long_tenured) THEN  
      Skip to Step 6  

   IF (late_year AND long_tenured) THEN  
      Skip to Step 7  

   IF (early_year AND mid_tenured) THEN  
      Skip to Step 8  

   IF (mid_year AND mid_tenured) THEN  
      Skip to Step 9  

   IF (late_year AND mid_tenured) THEN  
      Skip to Step 10  

   IF (early_year AND recently_hired AND start_year == {computed_application_year}-2) THEN  
      Skip to Step 11  

   IF (full_year AND recently_hired AND start_year == {computed_application_year}-2) THEN  
      Skip to Step 11  

   IF (full_year AND recently_hired AND start_year == {computed_application_year}-1) THEN  
      Skip to Step 12  

   IF (None above)  
      Raise DISCREPANCY MESSAGE: "None of the conditions passed for the rule 'Is documentation present for borrowers partnership business?'"

---

5.  
   IF (  
      (ALL OF:  
         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2  
      ) OR  
      (ALL OF:  
         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-3,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-3,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-3  
      ) OR  
      (ALL OF:  
         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1  
      ) OR  
      (ALL OF:  
         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2  
      )  
   ) THEN  
      LOG Passed Result:  
      "Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and Business Tax Returns (1065) are present for the most recent year. The business is in existence for five years as reflected on Form 1003." and terminate the process
   ELSE  
      RAISE DISCREPANCY MESSAGE:  
      "Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent year. As the business is in existence for five years as reflected on Form 1003." and terminate the process

---

6.  
   IF (  
      (ALL OF:  
         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2  
      ) OR  
      (ALL OF:  
         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-3,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-3,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-3,  
         From List of Form 4868, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Form 7004, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1  
      ) OR  
      (ALL OF:  
         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1  
      ) OR  
      (ALL OF:  
         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         Form 4868, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         Form 7004, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1  
      )  
   ) THEN  
      LOG Passed Result:  
      "Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and Business Tax Returns (1065) are present for the most recent year. Required extensions (Form 4868 and/or Form 7004) are also present." and terminate the process
   ELSE  
      RAISE DISCREPANCY MESSAGE:  
      "Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent year. Form 4868 and/or Form 7004 is missing, which is required if tax returns are unavailable. As the business has been in existence for more than five years as reflected on Form 1003." and terminate the process

---

7.  
   IF (  
      (ALL OF:  
         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2  
      ) OR  
      (ALL OF:  
         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1  
      )  
   ) THEN  
      LOG Passed Result:  
      "Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and Business Tax Returns (1065) are present for the most recent year. Form 4868 is not required as the application date is after October 15." and terminate the process
   ELSE  
      RAISE DISCREPANCY MESSAGE:  
      "Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent year. Form 4868 is not acceptable after October 15. As the business has been in existence for more than five years as reflected on Form 1003." and terminate the process

---

   IF (

         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,

   ) THEN  
      LOG Passed Result:  
      "Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and Business Tax Returns (1065) are present for the most recent two years. The business has been in existence for less than five years as reflected on Form 1003." and terminate the process
   ELSE  
      RAISE DISCREPANCY MESSAGE:  
      "Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent two years. As the business has been in existence for less than five years as reflected on Form 1003." and terminate the process

steps.discrepancy_messages:
1. Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040's) and / or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent year. As the business is in existence for five years as reflected on the Form 1003.

2. Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent year. Form 4868 and/or Form 7004 is missing, which is required if tax returns are unavailable. As the business has been in existence for more than five years as reflected on Form 1003.

3. Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent year. Form 4868 is not acceptable as the application date is after October 15. As the business has been in existence for more than five years as reflected on Form 1003.

4. Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent two years. As the business has been in existence for less than five years as reflected on Form 1003.

5. Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent two years. Form 4868 and/or Form 7004 is missing, which is required if tax returns for the most recent year are unavailable. As the business has been in existence for less than five years as reflected on Form 1003.

6. Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent two years. Form 4868 is not acceptable as the application date is after October 15th. As the business has been in existence for less than five years,as reflected on Form 1003. 

7. Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent two years. As the business has been in existence for less than five years as reflected on Form 1003.

8. Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent two years. As the business has been in existence for less than five years as reflected on Form 1003.

9. Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent year. As the business started less than 2 years ago as reflected on Form 1003.

htps.name: htp_documentation_check
htps.expert_instructions:
1. From the application_date, extract application_year in the form {computed_application_year}.
   From the current_employer.start_date (or "1b Start Date"), extract start_year in the form {computed_application_year}.

2. Classify the Application Date into these categories:
   - early_year: 01/01/{computed_application_year} ≤ application_date < 04/14/{computed_application_year}
   - mid_year: 04/15/{computed_application_year} ≤ application_date < 10/14/{computed_application_year}
   - late_year: 10/15/{computed_application_year} ≤ application_date ≤ 12/31/{computed_application_year}
   - full_year: 01/01/{computed_application_year} ≤ application_date ≤ 12/31/{computed_application_year}

3. Check the difference between start date and application date and classify it into these:
   - long_tenured: current_employer.start_date ≤ application_date − 5 years
   - mid_tenured: (application_date − 5 years) < current_employer.start_date ≤ (application_date − 2 years)
   - recently_hired: current_employer.start_date ≥ (application_date − 2 years)

4. Decision Flow:

   IF (early_year AND long_tenured) THEN  
      Skip to Step 5  

   IF (mid_year AND long_tenured) THEN  
      Skip to Step 6  

   IF (late_year AND long_tenured) THEN  
      Skip to Step 7  

   IF (early_year AND mid_tenured) THEN  
      Skip to Step 8  

   IF (mid_year AND mid_tenured) THEN  
      Skip to Step 9  

   IF (late_year AND mid_tenured) THEN  
      Skip to Step 10  

   IF (early_year AND recently_hired AND start_year == {computed_application_year}-2) THEN  
      Skip to Step 11  

   IF (full_year AND recently_hired AND start_year == {computed_application_year}-2) THEN  
      Skip to Step 11  

   IF (full_year AND recently_hired AND start_year == {computed_application_year}-1) THEN  
      Skip to Step 12  

   IF (None above)  
      Raise DISCREPANCY MESSAGE: "None of the conditions passed for the rule 'Is documentation present for borrowers partnership business?'"

---

   IF (  
      (ALL OF:  
         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,

   ) THEN  
      LOG Passed Result:  
      "Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and Business Tax Returns (1065) are present for the most recent year. The business is in existence for five years as reflected on Form 1003." and terminate the process
   ELSE  
      RAISE DISCREPANCY MESSAGE:

         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2  
      ) OR  
      (ALL OF:  
         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-3,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-3,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-3  
      )  
   ) THEN  
      LOG Passed Result:  
      "Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and Business Tax Returns (1065) are present for the most recent two years. The business has been in existence for less than five years as reflected on Form 1003." and terminate the process
   ELSE  
      RAISE DISCREPANCY MESSAGE:  
      "Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent two years. As the business has been in existence for less than five years as reflected on Form 1003." and terminate the process

---

9.  
   IF (  
      (ALL OF:  
         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2  
      ) OR  
      (ALL OF:  
         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-3,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-3,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-3,  
         From List of Form 4868, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Form 7004, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1  
      )  
   ) THEN  
      LOG Passed Result:  
      "Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and Business Tax Returns (1065) are present for the most recent two years. Required extensions (Form 4868 and/or Form 7004) are also present." and terminate the process
   ELSE 
      RAISE DISCREPANCY MESSAGE:  
      "Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent two years. Form 4868 and/or Form 7004 is missing. As the business has been in existence for less than five years as reflected on Form 1003." and terminate the process

---

10.  
   IF (  
      (ALL OF:  
         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2  
      )  
   ) THEN  
      LOG Passed Result:  
      "Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and Business Tax Returns (1065) are present for the most recent two years. Form 4868 is not required as the application date is after October 15."
   ELSE  
      RAISE DISCREPANCY MESSAGE:  
      "Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent two years. Form 4868 is not acceptable after October 15. As the business has been in existence for less than five years as reflected on Form 1003." and terminate the process

---

11.  
   IF (  
      (ALL OF:  
         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-2  
      )  
   ) THEN  
      LOG Passed Result:  
      "Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and Business Tax Returns (1065) are present for the most recent two years. The business has been in existence for less than five years as reflected on Form 1003." and terminate the process
   ELSE  
      RAISE DISCREPANCY MESSAGE:  
      "Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent two years. As the business has been in existence for less than five years as reflected on Form 1003." and terminate the process

---

12.  
   IF (  
      (ALL OF:  
         From List of Tax Form1040, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1065, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1,  
         From List of Tax Form1065SCHK1, if one exists for the year {computed_application_year}-1  
      )  
   ) THEN  
      LOG Passed Result:  
      "Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and Business Tax Returns (1065) are present for the most recent year. The business started less than 2 years ago as reflected on Form 1003." and terminate the process
   ELSE  
      RAISE DISCREPANCY MESSAGE:  
      "Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent year. As the business started less than 2 years ago as reflected on Form 1003." and terminate the process
htps.discrepancy_messages:
1. Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040's) and / or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent year. As the business is in existence for five years as reflected on the Form 1003.

2. Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent year. Form 4868 and/or Form 7004 is missing, which is required if tax returns are unavailable. As the business has been in existence for more than five years as reflected on Form 1003.

3. Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent year. Form 4868 is not acceptable as the application date is after October 15. As the business has been in existence for more than five years as reflected on Form 1003.

4. Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent two years. As the business has been in existence for less than five years as reflected on Form 1003.

5. Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent two years. Form 4868 and/or Form 7004 is missing, which is required if tax returns for the most recent year are unavailable. As the business has been in existence for less than five years as reflected on Form 1003.

6. Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent two years. Form 4868 is not acceptable as the application date is after October 15th. As the business has been in existence for less than five years,as reflected on Form 1003. 

7. Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent two years. As the business has been in existence for less than five years as reflected on Form 1003.

8. Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent two years. As the business has been in existence for less than five years as reflected on Form 1003.

9. Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent year. As the business started less than 2 years ago as reflected on Form 1003.

subtasks.description: Extract the computed_application_year from the application_date. Parse the 'application_date.value' (which can be in MM/DD/YYYY, MM-DD-YYYY or MM.DD.YYYY format) and extract the year part as a string. The extracted year will be referred to as {computed_application_year}.
outputs: 'computed_application_year': Year extracted from application_date as a string

arguments.description: Date in format: MM/DD/YYYY, MM-DD-YYYY, or MM.DD.YYYY

return_description.description: Year extracted from application_date as a string

subtasks.description: Extract the start_year from the current employer's start_date. Navigate to the first borrower in the 'borrowers' list, then to 'URLA' -> 'current_employer' list -> first employer -> 'start_date.value'. Parse the date (which can be in MM/DD/YYYY, MM-DD-YYYY or MM.DD.YYYY format) and extract the year part. This extracted year is referred to as start_year in the form {computed_application_year}.
outputs: 'start_year': Year extracted from current_employer.start_date as a string

arguments.description: List of borrowers containing employment details

value.description: Date in format: MM/DD/YYYY, MM-DD-YYYY, or MM.DD.YYYY

return_description.description: Year extracted from current_employer.start_date as a string

subtasks.description:
Classify the Application Date into one of the four categories using the computed_application_year. Calculate the following boundaries based on computed_application_year: 
• early_year: from 01/01/{computed_application_year} (inclusive) up to 04/14/{computed_application_year} (exclusive)
• mid_year: from 04/15/{computed_application_year} (inclusive) up to 10/14/{computed_application_year} (exclusive)
• late_year: from 10/15/{computed_application_year} (inclusive) to 12/31/{computed_application_year} (inclusive)
• full_year: from 01/01/{computed_application_year} to 12/31/{computed_application_year} (both inclusive).
Then compare the application_date against these boundaries and output the identified category.
formulas: Determine category by: if application_date is in early_year_boundary then category = 'early_year', etc.
outputs: 'application_date_category': Category of the application date (early_year, mid_year, late_year, or full_year)

arguments.description: Date of the application in format: MM/DD/YYYY, MM-DD-YYYY, or MM.DD.YYYY
Year extracted from application_date as a string from subtask 1.a

function_details.function_description: Classifies the application date into one of four categories (early_year, mid_year, late_year, full_year) based on the computed_application_year. It calculates the boundaries for each category and compares the application_date against these boundaries to determine the category.

return_description.description: Category of the application date (early_year, mid_year, late_year, or full_year)

subtasks.description:
Determine the employment tenure category by comparing the current employer start_date and the application_date. Compute two threshold dates by subtracting 5 years and 2 years from the application_date. Then classify as follows:
• long_tenured: if current_employer.start_date is on or before (application_date - 5 years).
• mid_tenured: if current_employer.start_date is after (application_date - 5 years) and on or before (application_date - 2 years).
• recently_hired: if current_employer.start_date is after (application_date - 2 years).
formulas: else if threshold_5 < current_employer_start_date <= threshold_2 then tenure = 'mid_tenured'
else if current_employer_start_date > threshold_2 then tenure = 'recently_hired'
outputs: 'employment_tenure_category': Employment tenure classification (long_tenured, mid_tenured, or recently_hired)

arguments.description: The date of the application. Valid formats are MM/DD/YYYY, MM-DD-YYYY, or MM.DD.YYYY.
The start date of the current employer. Valid formats are MM/DD/YYYY, MM-DD-YYYY, or MM.DD.YYYY.

return_description.description: Employment tenure classification (long_tenured, mid_tenured, or recently_hired)

subtasks.description: Check if the application_date category is 'early_year' and employment tenure is 'long_tenured'. If true, set skip_to_task to 'Step 5'.
outputs: 'decision': 'skip to Step 5' if condition is met

inputs: 'Tax Form 1040' documents: input_data -> 'borrowers' -> first borrower -> 'Tax Form 1040' (list) with their 'tax_year.value'
'Tax Form 1065' documents: input_data -> 'other_doc_types' -> 'Tax Form 1065' (list) with their 'tax_year.value'
'Tax Form 1065SCHK1' documents: input_data -> 'borrowers' -> first borrower -> 'Tax Form 1065SCHK1' (list) with their 'tax_year.value'
formulas: Define groups based on document 'tax_year.value' matching computed_application_year offset by 1,2 or 3 as specified.
outputs: 'log_message': Passed result string if condition is met
subtasks.discrepancy_string: Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040's) and / or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent year. As the business is in existence for five years as reflected on the Form 1003.

arguments.description: 'Tax Form 1040' documents: input_data -> 'borrowers' -> first borrower -> 'Tax Form 1040' (list) with their 'tax_year.value'
'Tax Form 1065' documents: input_data -> 'other_doc_types' -> 'Tax Form 1065' (list) with their 'tax_year.value'
'Tax Form 1065SCHK1' documents: input_data -> 'borrowers' -> first borrower -> 'Tax Form 1065SCHK1' (list) with their 'tax_year.value'
'computed_application_year': output from subtask 1.a

return_description.description: Passed result string if condition is met
Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040's) and / or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent year. As the business is in existence for five years as reflected on the Form 1003.
Indicates whether to terminate the process

subtasks.description:
For Step 6, check if the following condition is met: Either all documents in Group A (Tax Form 1040 for {computed_application_year}-1 and {computed_application_year}-2, Tax Form 1065 for {computed_application_year}-1 and {computed_application_year}-2, Tax Form 1065SCHK1 for {computed_application_year}-1 and {computed_application_year}-2) OR all documents in Group B (Tax Form 1040 for {computed_application_year}-2 and {computed_application_year}-3, Tax Form 1065 for {computed_application_year}-2 and {computed_application_year}-3, Tax Form 1065SCHK1 for {computed_application_year}-2 and {computed_application_year}-3, and additionally Form 4868 and Form 7004 for {computed_application_year}-1) OR Group C (Tax Form 1040, Tax Form 1065, and Tax Form 1065SCHK1 for {computed_application_year}-1) OR Group D (Tax Form 1040, Tax Form 1065, and Tax Form 1065SCHK1 for {computed_application_year}-2 with Form 4868 and/or Form 7004 for {computed_application_year}-1).
If any complete group is present, log the passed result message and terminate the process; else raise the discrepancy message.
formulas: Group conditions similar to Step 5 with additional extension forms in Groups B and D.
outputs: 'log_message': Passed result string if condition is met
subtasks.discrepancy_string: Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent year. Form 4868 and/or Form 7004 is missing, which is required if tax returns are unavailable. As the business has been in existence for more than five years as reflected on Form 1003.

arguments.description: 'Tax Form 1040' documents as in Step 5
'Tax Form 1065' documents as in Step 5
'Tax Form 1065SCHK1' documents as in Step 5
'Form 4868': input_data -> 'other_doc_types' -> 'Tax Form 4868'
'Form 7004': input_data -> 'other_doc_types' -> 'Tax Form 7004'
'computed_application_year': output from subtask 1.a

return_description.description: Passed result string if condition is met

Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent year. Form 4868 and/or Form 7004 is missing, which is required if tax returns are unavailable. As the business has been in existence for more than five years as reflected on Form 1003.
Indicates whether to terminate the process

subtasks.description:
For Step 7, check if either:
Group 1: All of Tax Form 1040 for {computed_application_year}-1 and {computed_application_year}-2, Tax Form 1065 for {computed_application_year}-1 and {computed_application_year}-2, and Tax Form 1065SCHK1 for {computed_application_year}-1 and {computed_application_year}-2; OR
Group 2: All of Tax Form 1040, Tax Form 1065, and Tax Form 1065SCHK1 for {computed_application_year}-1.
If one of these groups is complete, log the passed message (noting that Form 4868 is not required as the application date is after October 15) and terminate the process; else raise the discrepancy.
inputs: 'Tax Form 1040', 'Tax Form 1065', 'Tax Form 1065SCHK1' documents as in Step 5
outputs: 'log_message': Passed result string if condition is met
subtasks.discrepancy_string: Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent year. Form 4868 is not acceptable as the application date is after October 15. As the business has been in existence for more than five years as reflected on Form 1003.

arguments.description: 'Tax Form 1040', 'Tax Form 1065', 'Tax Form 1065SCHK1' documents as in Step 5

arguments.description: Year extracted from application_date as a string from subtask 1.a

return_description.description: Passed result string if condition is met

Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent year. Form 4868 is not acceptable as the application date is after October 15. As the business has been in existence for more than five years as reflected on Form 1003.
Indicates whether to terminate the process

subtasks.description:
For Step 8, verify if either of the following is true: 
Option 1: All of Tax Form 1040 for {computed_application_year}-1 and {computed_application_year}-2, Tax Form 1065 for {computed_application_year}-1 and {computed_application_year}-2, and Tax Form 1065SCHK1 for {computed_application_year}-1 and {computed_application_year}-2; OR
Option 2: All of Tax Form 1040 for {computed_application_year}-2 and {computed_application_year}-3, Tax Form 1065 for {computed_application_year}-2 and {computed_application_year}-3, and Tax Form 1065SCHK1 for {computed_application_year}-2 and {computed_application_year}-3.
If condition is met, log the passed result message (noting that the business has been in existence for less than five years) and terminate the process; otherwise, raise the discrepancy.
outputs: 'log_message': Passed result string if condition is met
subtasks.discrepancy_string: Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent two years. As the business has been in existence for less than five years as reflected on Form 1003.

function_details.function_description: Verifies if the required tax documents for the specified years are present. If the condition is met, logs a passed result message indicating the business has been in existence for less than five years and terminates the process. Otherwise, raises a discrepancy.

arguments.description: Tax Form 1040 documents as in Step 5

value.description: Tax Form 1040.First Name and Initial String

arguments.description: Tax Form 1065 documents as in Step 5
Tax Form 1065SCHK1 documents as in Step 5
Year extracted from application_date as a string from subtask 1.a

return_description.description: Passed result string if condition is met

Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent two years. As the business has been in existence for less than five years as reflected on Form 1003.
Indicates whether to terminate the process

subtasks.description:
For Step 9, verify if either of the following conditions is met: 
Option 1: All of Tax Form 1040 for {computed_application_year}-1 and {computed_application_year}-2, Tax Form 1065 for {computed_application_year}-1 and {computed_application_year}-2, and Tax Form 1065SCHK1 for {computed_application_year}-1 and {computed_application_year}-2; OR
Option 2: All of Tax Form 1040 for {computed_application_year}-2 and {computed_application_year}-3, Tax Form 1065 for {computed_application_year}-2 and {computed_application_year}-3, Tax Form 1065SCHK1 for {computed_application_year}-2 and {computed_application_year}-3, AND also verify that Form 4868 and Form 7004 exist for {computed_application_year}-1.
If condition is met, log the passed result message (indicating required extensions are present) and terminate the process; otherwise, raise the discrepancy.
inputs: 'Tax Form 1040', 'Tax Form 1065', 'Tax Form 1065SCHK1' documents as in Step 5
outputs: 'log_message': Passed result string if condition is met
subtasks.discrepancy_string: Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent two years. Form 4868 and/or Form 7004 is missing. As the business has been in existence for less than five years as reflected on Form 1003.

function_details.function_description: This function verifies if the required tax documentation is present for the specified years based on the computed application year. It checks two options: Option 1 requires all tax forms for the two most recent years, and Option 2 requires all tax forms for the two years before the most recent year, along with Form 4868 and Form 7004 for the most recent year. If any condition is met, it logs a passed result message and terminates the process; otherwise, it raises a discrepancy.

arguments.description: Tax Form 1040 documents as in Step 5
Tax Form 1065 documents as in Step 5
Tax Form 1065SCHK1 documents as in Step 5
Form 4868 documents from input_data -> 'other_doc_types' -> 'Tax Form 4868'
Form 7004 documents from input_data -> 'other_doc_types' -> 'Tax Form 7004'
Year extracted from application_date as a string from subtask 1.a

return_description.description: Passed result string if condition is met

Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent two years. Form 4868 and/or Form 7004 is missing. As the business has been in existence for less than five years as reflected on Form 1003.
Indicates whether to terminate the process

subtasks.description: For Step 10, check if all of Tax Form 1040 for {computed_application_year}-1 and {computed_application_year}-2, Tax Form 1065 for {computed_application_year}-1 and {computed_application_year}-2, and Tax Form 1065SCHK1 for {computed_application_year}-1 and {computed_application_year}-2 are present. If so, log the passed result message noting that Form 4868 is not required since the application date is after October 15. Otherwise, raise the discrepancy.
inputs: 'Tax Form 1040', 'Tax Form 1065', 'Tax Form 1065SCHK1' documents as in Step 5
outputs: 'log_message': Passed result string if condition is met
subtasks.discrepancy_string: Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent two years. Form 4868 is not acceptable as the application date is after October 15. As the business has been in existence for less than five years as reflected on Form 1003.

function_details.function_description: Checks if all required Tax Forms (1040, 1065, 1065SCHK1) for the last two years are present. Logs a passed result message if all forms are present, otherwise raises a discrepancy.

Borrower's personal Tax Returns (1040s) and/or Business Tax Returns (1065) are missing for the most recent two years. Form 4868 is not acceptable as the application date is after October 15. As the business has been in existence for less than five years as reflected on Form 1003.
Indicates whether to terminate the process

subtasks.description: For Step 11, verify if all of Tax Form 1040, Tax Form 1065, and Tax Form 1065SCHK1 for {computed_application_year}-1 and {computed_application_year}-2 are present. If they are, log the passed result indicating that the business has been in existence for less than five years and terminate the process; else, raise the discrepancy.
